menu.name: Two large steamed cabbage leaves stuffed with pure ground turkey, baked in sweet and sour sauce, served with real mashed potatoes, broccoli and carrots
Large lamb shank cooked in special sauce and served with real mashed potatoes, broccoli and carrots
Fresh filet of salmon sautéed in very delicious homemade tomato sauce, served with real mashed potatoes broccoli and carrots
Fresh sautéed shrimp served on a bed of linguini with garlic cream or tomato cream sauce
